message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for $120. It's a fantastic deal, and I think you'll really love it!
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I appreciate it, but I'm looking to pay closer to $100.  Let me know what you think.

Thanks for the counteroffer, Bob! I understand your budget constraints, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer you the product for $110. It's a great compromise, and I think you'll really enjoy the product at this price!
